meanings.definition: A flat structure made of logs or planks fastened together for floating on water.
meanings.sent1: The raft floated gently down the river.
meanings.sent2: We built a raft to cross the lake.
meanings.sent3: The ducks used the raft as a resting spot.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a raft in the storm of his sadness.
meanings.sent5: The raft bobbed up and down with the waves.

meanings.sent1: There was a raft of books on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: A raft of people attended the concert.
meanings.sent3: The party had a raft of delicious snacks.
meanings.sent4: She received a raft of compliments on her performance.
meanings.sent5: The field was covered in a raft of colorful flowers.
